Text: Info - The video was commissioned by Mega_Upload founder Kim Dotcom and features the likes of P. Diddy, Kanye West, Will.i.am, Snoop Dogg, Alicia Keys, Jamie Foxx, Lil John,Chris Brown,Kim Kardashian & more. The video went viral very quickly, making it to Twitter’s trending topics within a short amount of time – and then Universal Music stepped in.
